info.description:
Just some more automata, using larger neighborhood. Fullscreen recommended.

CONTROLS:  Enter=switch to 3x3, 7-9=speed, m=see automata, a=antialiasing, space=regenerate

ZOOM: Mouse x zooms, arrow keys pan.
info.name: Automata XII Showcase 3x2 (3x3)
